items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Gift Nifty, muted global cues signal slow start for India; Nikkei down 3%
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates, Monday, September 9, 2024: Share markets in Asia slid on Monday after worries about a possible US economic downturn slugged Wall Street, while dragging bond yields and commo

items.title: Stocks to Watch: Jio Fin, PNB Housing, SpiceJet, Mazagon, Ola Electric
items.description: Jio Financial Services has formed a joint venture with BlackRock Advisors Singapore to provide investment advisory services.

items.title: SBI Card, Laxmi Organic and GAEL among top bets by Jigar S Patel for today
items.description: Over the past 7-8 weeks, Laxmi Organic Industries has been trading within a relatively narrow range of approximately Rs 235-270, indicating a period of consolidation.

items.title: Buy on dips strategy suggested for Nifty; Check support & other levels here
items.description: The recent correction in the Nifty 50 index should be seen as a pullback within an overall bullish trend on short-term charts. The best trading strategy for both traders & investors is to buy on dips.

items.title: Share market today: Global markets, Bajaj Housing IPO, Ola Electric eyed
items.description: Share market today: Market in Asia dragged after worries about a possible US economic downturn slammed Wall Street on Friday. Bajaj Housing Finance IPO opens, while Gala Precision will list.

items.title: Dividend, Bonus, Right Issue: GSFC and 17 other stocks go ex-date today
items.description: Shares of Franklin Industries will trade ex-date today for the bonus issue, while Ganesha Ecoverse shares will trade ex-date today for the rights issue for their respective shareholders

items.title: Indian bond yields may dip; no clarity over Fed rate hike to limit fall
items.description: Markets have fully priced in a rate cut of at least 25 bps at the Fed's policy decision due on Sept. 18, with expectations for a 50 bps remaining around 30%

items.title: F&O Insights: Options data hint Nifty may fall to 24,500; FIIs pare longs
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 09: FIIs were net sellers in Nifty futures for the sixth straight trading session on Friday; Nifty weekly PCR drops to 0.6:1.

items.title: Brokerages upbeat on Bajaj Housing Finance IPO; GMP up 81%; should you bid?
items.description: Adding to the buzz, the shares of Bajaj Housing Finance are commanding a strong premium in the grey market on the first day of its opening

items.title: Deep Industries at all-time high on Rs 1,400-cr order win; stock flies 17%
items.description: The uptick in Depp Industries share price came after the company announced that it has secured an order worth Rs 1,402 crore from Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC).

items.title: Mazagon Dock share price gains on bagging Rs 1,486 crore contract from ONGC
items.description: The uptick in Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders share price came after the company announced that it has been awarded a contract from Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC) worth Rs 1,486.40 crore.

items.title: Adani Green redeems $750 mn bonds eight months ahead of redemption date
items.description: Issued in September 2021, the three-year Holdco Notes supported AGEL's high-growth objectives. During the period, AGEL's capacity has increased more than three-fold

items.title: Suven Pharma hits record high on USFDA's 'VAI' tag to Hyderabad facility
items.description: Suven Pharmaceuticals share price surged up to 3.67 per cent, hitting their all time high at Rs 1,245 per share on the BSE on Monday

items.title: These 2 chart patterns signal more pain likely for Nifty; can break 24,000
items.description: The Nifty weekly chart saw formation of a 'Bearish Engulfing' pattern last week; earlier the monthly chart saw 'Hanging Man' structure. Both patterns technically indicate a likely trend reversal.

items.title: Here's why RBM Infracon stock was locked in 5% upper circuit today; details
items.description: The uptick in the RBM Infracon stock price came after the company announced that it has bagged an order worth Rs 3,498 crore from Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC).

items.title: Gala Precision Engg bucks market trend, lists at 42% premium on bourses
items.description: Gala Precision Engineering IPO listing today:  Gala Precision Engineering shares listed at Rs 750 on the BSE, reflecting a premium of 41.77 per cent over their issue price of Rs 529

items.title: Senco Gold jumps 5%, hits new high on healthy outlook; zooms 212% in 1 year
items.description: The industry tailwinds are expected to benefit the organised jewellery retailers like Senco over the medium term, supported by its expanding retail presence.

items.title: SpiceJet shares fly 5.5% in trade; here is what is driving the stock
items.description: Large deals of 1.5 million shares take place in SpiceJet, the company plans QIP, restructuring, and settlement with Carlyle Aviation

items.title: Ion Exchange shares rise after winning order worth Rs 168 cr; check details
items.description: Ion Exchange share price surged up to 3 per cent to record an intraday high of Rs 685.20 per share on the BSE on Monday

items.title: Hindustan Unilever stock hits new high, up 1%; here's why
items.description: The company's board appointed a committee to evaluate the future of its ice cream business and also accorded its approval to explore potential structures and alternatives for the same.

items.title: Rupee flat as markets expect RBI support; other Asian currencies slip
items.description: While there is a small possibility that the RBI may let the currency weaken slightly below the 84 mark, runaway moves remain quite unlikely

items.title: USFDA issues six observations for Granules' Gagillapur unit; stock falls 5%
items.description: The fall in Granules India share price came after the company announced that United States Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) has issued six observations for the company's Gagillapur facility.

items.title: Suzlon Energy shares rise 3% on winning large wind energy order from NTPC
items.description: Suzlon Energy stock price surged up to 3.27 per cent to record an intraday high of Rs 77.18 per share on the BSE on Monday

items.title: Bharti Airtel's valuations to sustain on market share & cash flow gains
items.description: Given these triggers, brokerages believe that premium valuations for the stock are justified

items.title: Tolins Tyres' IPO opens today; check lot size, listing and other details
items.description: Tolins Tyres Ltd's IPO opens for subscription today. Check details of lot size, allotment, listing, and other key aspects

items.title: IPO Alert: Kross opens today with a 20% GMP surge; should you subscribe?
items.description: The unlisted shares of Kross were commanding a grey market premium (GMP) of Rs 48 or 20 per cent at the upper end of the IPO price on Monday

items.title: Nibe share price locked in 5% upper band after units secure multiple orders
items.description: The surge in the Nibe shares came after the company announced multiple order wins by its subsidiaries.

items.title: Bhavish Aggarwal-led Ola Electric slips 4% as 30-day anchor lock in ends
items.description: The 90-day anchor investor lock in period for Ola Electric Mobility ends on November 5, 2024, for the remaining shares

items.title: PSBs extend fall after Goldman Sachs downgrades SBI; Canara, UBI down 3%
items.description: The Nifty PSU Bank index, the top loser among sectoral indices, was down 1.1 per cent at 6,581.40, as compared to the 0.16 per cent rise in the Nifty 50 at 11:14 AM on Monday.

items.title: Final Hours! Shree Tirupati Balajee IPO ends today; GMP up 72%; bid now?
items.description: The three-day subscription window to bid for the Shree Tirupati Balajee IPO, which opened on Thursday, September 5, 2024, ends today

items.title: Nifty PSU Bank index dips below 200-DMA after more than 2 years; what next?
items.description: The PSU Bank index had zoomed 200% to a high of 8,053 after breaking above its 200-DMA in July 2022. At present, most PSU Bank stocks, barring SBI, are trading below this long-term moving average.

items.title: SME IPO surge: These 4 firms invite bids today; price, lot size and more
items.description: A total four small and medium enterprises (SME) initial public offerings (IPO) are inviting bids for their respective issues starting from Monday, 9, September, 2024

items.title: Asian markets dip after Wall Street had its worst week in nearly 18 months
items.description: Asian stocks fell Monday after another rout hit Wall Street on Friday, as a highly anticipated update on the US job market came in weak enough to add to worries about the economy.

items.title: FPIs seek legal route to dodge Sebi norms; deadline to disclose BO expires
items.description: Some FPIs have sought legal avenue to avoid complying with rules requiring disclosure of ultimate beneficial ownership (BO) to the markets regulator Sebi as the deadline expires on Monday.

items.title: Shriram Finance plans to raise $1 bn from overseas; shares hit a life high
items.description: Shriram Finance shares hit all time high after the company plans to raise $1 bn from overseas in the next 6 months

items.title: These 2 smallcap stocks have zoomed over 100% in 5 wks; hit multi-year high
items.description: Shares of Kitex Garments and Tribhovandas Bhimji Zaveri have hit multi-year highs after rallying up to 17% on the BSE in Monday's intra-day trade on the back of heavy volumes.

items.title: Va Tech Wabag stock soars as Axis Sec initiates coverage with 'Buy' rating
items.description: Domestic brokerage firm Axis Securities, initiated coverage on the water supply and management company with a 'Buy' rating at a target price of Rs 1,700 per share, reflecting an upside of 29.4%

items.title: Wardwizard Innovations to form joint venture in Saudi; share price rises 6%
items.description: The JV is aimed at establishing an assembly plant and an EV cell plant in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA).

items.title: Premier Energies extends rally after strong debut; mcap cross Rs 50,000 cr
items.description: With a market cap of Rs 52,155 crore, Premier Energies was trading 6 per cent higher at Rs 1,157 on the BSE at 1:57 PM.

items.title: Kamdhenu Ventures to expand premium products line-up; stock climbs 2.5%
items.description: Kamdhenu Paints, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Kamdhenu Ventures, announced that it is set to expand its premium product line with the introduction of a new wood coatings range

items.title: Shyam Metalics share gains 3% on 5-yr growth plans in steel, aluminium biz
items.description: The stock price climbed after the company's management informed investors about its growth plans in its businesses of aluminium and stainless-steel products

items.title: Panacea Biotec freezes in 10% upper circuit; stock zooms 101% in 1 month
items.description: A combined 2.1 million equity shares of the company had changed hands till 02:50 PM, and there are pending buy orders for nearly 100,000 shares on the NSE and BSE.
